content.data: There was such a thundering sound that the people were absorbed in the illusion and the dust of the horses’ feet arose high to touch the sky, because of the dust, the golden rays disappeared and the darkness prevailed, in that confusion, there was a showe
ਅੰਧਾ ਧੁੰਧ ਮਾਰ ਮਚ ਰਹੀ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਸ਼ਸਤ੍ਰਾਂ ਦੇ ਝਾੜਨ ਨਾਲ (ਅੱਗ ਦੀਆਂ) ਚਿੰਗਾਰੀਆਂ ਨਿਕਲੀਆਂ ਹਨ ॥੪੮੨॥
